title: Add latest panchang information display

requirements.text: Create a backend function to calculate and return panchang data for a given date including Tithi (lunar day), Nakshatra (constellation), Yoga, Karana, sunrise time, sunset time, moonrise time, and moonset time

quotes: Add information off latest panchang in this app

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a query function that accepts a date parameter and returns complete panchang information
Panchang data includes all traditional elements: Tithi, Nakshatra, Yoga, Karana, and astronomical timings
Function returns data structure compatible with frontend display requirements

requirements.text: Add Marathi translations for all panchang-related terms including Tithi names (प्रतिपदा, द्वितीया, etc.), Nakshatra names (अश्विनी, भरणी, etc.), Yoga names, and Karana names

quotes: Add information off latest panchang in this app

acceptanceCriteria: All panchang terminology is translated to Marathi following the existing marathi.ts structure
Translation utilities handle panchang term conversion similar to existing planet and zodiac translations

requirements.text: Create a PanchangCard component that displays daily panchang information in a visually organized card format with sections for Tithi, Nakshatra, Yoga, Karana, and astronomical timings, styled consistently with the existing traditional Indian astrology theme

quotes: Add information off latest panchang in this app

acceptanceCriteria: Component renders all panchang elements in an organized, readable layout
Styling matches existing PlanetCard component patterns using saffron, gold, and terracotta color scheme
Component displays information in Marathi using translated terms
Card includes appropriate iconography for different panchang elements

requirements.text: Add a new Panchang page route accessible from the main navigation that displays the latest panchang information using the PanchangCard component, with loading and error states

quotes: Add information off latest panchang in this app

acceptanceCriteria: New route /panchang is added to the router configuration in App.tsx
Navigation menu in Layout component includes link to Panchang page with Marathi label
Page fetches and displays current date panchang data with appropriate loading spinner
Error states are handled with user-friendly Marathi messages

requirements.text: Create React Query hooks for fetching panchang data that integrate with the backend actor, following the existing pattern in useQueries.ts

quotes: Add information off latest panchang in this app

acceptanceCriteria: Hook follows the established React Query pattern used for planetary and compatibility data
Query handles authentication state and actor availability
Hook provides loading, error, and data states for consumption by UI components

constraints: Maintain consistency with existing Marathi language interface throughout the application
Follow the established traditional Indian astrology visual theme with saffron, deep gold, and terracotta colors
Use the single-actor architecture pattern for all backend logic in main.mo
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, hooks/useActor.ts, main.tsx, and components/ui
nonGoals: Historical panchang data lookup for past dates
Panchang predictions or interpretations beyond displaying current information
User-specific panchang customization or saved preferences
Integration with external panchang calculation APIs
